tool_description: Detailed and accurate information for each U.S. state and territory in JSON format.
name: US States
title: US States

api_list.name: Get subdivisions by abbreviation
api_list.description: Retrieve all state subdivisions for the provided state abbreviation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states.p.rapidapi.com/subdivisions/CT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states.p.rapidapi.com/subdivisions/{abbreviation}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get metadata
api_list.description: Get value lists for common fields.

api_list.name: Get states by FIPS
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for states matching the provided FIPS code(s).  Multiple FIPS codes can be provided separated by commas.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-states.p.rapidapi.com/fips/16"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-states.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search states by capital
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for states/territories matching the provided capital.  Partial and full name searches are accepted.

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search states by name
api_list.description: Retrieve all fields for states/territories matching the provided Name.  Name field is searched.  Partial and full name searches are accepted.
